page.title: 20RATES REVALUATION IN RHU.
page.content: Although not peculiar to our area,many local residents are concerned over the recent rates revaluation which has taken place in Scotland.It is felt that ours is an already extremely highly rated area and that this is proving to be an ever_increasing financial burden especially when many people feel that the standard of public services, at present, does not merit such high rates.
